summary: Completed testing of admin panel delete functionality, dark/light theme toggle, and slogan update. All requested features are working correctly.

test_results.admin_login: PASS - Admin login with becayis/1234 works correctly
test_results.admin_user_delete: PASS - User delete button works, shows confirmation dialog, deletes user
test_results.admin_listing_delete: PASS - Listing delete button works, shows confirmation dialog ('İlanı silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?'), deletes listing
test_results.dark_theme_home: PASS - Dark theme applies correctly on home page, HTML class changes to 'dark'
test_results.dark_theme_dashboard: PASS - Dark theme applies correctly on dashboard, proper contrast maintained
test_results.theme_toggle: PASS - Theme toggle button works, switches between light/dark modes
test_results.slogan_update: PASS - Slogan does NOT contain 'TC Kimlik' or 'sicil no' - shows 'Kamu Çalışanları için Yer Değişim Platformu'

api_tests.POST /api/admin/login: PASS - Returns access_token with is_admin claim
api_tests.GET /api/admin/users: PASS - Returns users list with profile data
api_tests.DELETE /api/admin/users/{id}: PASS - Deletes user and related data

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings in useEffect dependencies (AdminDashboard.js, ChatPage.js, CreateEditListing.js, Home.js) - not critical but should be addressed for code quality
seed_data_creation: Created test listing for admin delete testing

mocked_apis.OTP_SMS: OTP verification is MOCKED - returns OTP in response for testing, real SMS not sent

context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin panel features tested and working. Admin can login, view users/listings, delete users, delete listings. Dark/light theme toggle works on both home page and dashboard. Slogan has been updated to remove TC Kimlik/sicil no references.
